body_html:
Internally to Google there's a vmodule feature that lets you do per-level customization

IE, --vmodule=gpu_util=2,executor=2 will allow vlog=2 messages originating from gpu_util.cc and executor.cc

I think it would be nice to bring this feature in open-source version, perhaps through envvar rather than flags.
body_text:
Internally to Google there's a vmodule feature that lets you do per-level customization
IE, --vmodule=gpu_util=2,executor=2 will allow vlog=2 messages originating from gpu_util.cc and executor.cc
I think it would be nice to bring this feature in open-source version, perhaps through envvar rather than flags.
body:
Internally to Google there's a `vmodule` feature that lets you do per-level customization

IE, `--vmodule=gpu_util=2,executor=2` will allow vlog=2 messages originating from gpu_util.cc and executor.cc

I think it would be nice to bring this feature in open-source version, perhaps through envvar rather than flags.
